Short Summary: Enforces blob versioning on required containers.
Mandates share snapshots for required file shares.
Validates blob soft-delete is enabled for data recovery.
Validates container soft-delete is enabled for data recovery.
Restricts cross-tenant replication to authorized accounts.
Verifies diagnostic logging to Log Analytics is configured.
Limits anonymous access to explicitly authorized containers.
Enforce Data Lake ACLs by disabling Shared Key access with HNS enabled
